p: As it is known that many children are asymptomatic or have mild symptoms, there are increasing concerns on children's role in transmitting disease. However, the importance of children in transmitting the virus remains uncertain. The majority of the children infected with SARS-CoV-2 reported thus far have a documented household contact, often showing symptoms before infected children, suggesting the possibility that children are not an important reservoir for SARS-CoV-2.
